import { React, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Header, Table, Rating } from 'semantic-ui-react' import JobAdvertisementService from '../services/JobAdvertisementService' export default function JobAdvertisementListByEmployer() { const [jobAdvertisements, setJobAdvertisements] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let jobAdvertisementService = new JobAdvertisementService() jobAdvertisementService.getJobAdvertisementByEmployer().then(result => setJobAdvertisements(result.data.data)) }, []) return (
Id Job Description Job Position Location Number Of Position Max Salary Min Salary Approve {jobAdvertisements ? jobAdvertisements.map(jobAdvertisement => ( {jobAdvertisement.jobAdvertisementId} {jobAdvertisement.jobDescription} {jobAdvertisement.jobPosition} {jobAdvertisement.location} {jobAdvertisement.numberOfPosition} {jobAdvertisement.maxSalary} {jobAdvertisement.minSalary} {jobAdvertisement.approve ? ( Approved ) : not approved } )) : null}
) }
